resource.description: The ``AWS::ApiGateway::ClientCertificate`` resource creates a client certificate that API Gateway uses to configure client-side SSL authentication for sending requests to the integration endpoint.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the client certificate.

type.description: The description of the client certificate.

attributes.description: The ``AWS::ApiGateway::ClientCertificate`` resource creates a client certificate that API Gateway uses to configure client-side SSL authentication for sending requests to the integration endpoint.
